title: Plate, "25 Oct. 1917-1922", 1922
markings: Marks: On underside: Imperial Porcelain Factory mark for Nicholas II with 1899 stamped in green underglaze; hammer, sickle, cog, V, 1922 (special fifth anniversary mark of the State Porcelain Factory) hand-painted in blue overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular, with shaped edge; in the center a "V," a red star, and a farmer and blacksmith shaking hands; around the border the inscription, in Russian, "25 Oct./1917-1922" with stylized foliage

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "25 Oct. 1917-1922", 1922.
1922. porcelain, enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-22.
